jobs.title: Software Development Engineer
jobs.description:
4+ years of development and delivery experience with C# / Java / Ruby on Rails and/or mobile technologies 

Hands-on experience in analysis, design, coding, and implementation of complex, custom-built applications 

Great OO skills, including strong design patterns knowledge 

Familiarity with relational databases, preferably Oracle or SQL Server

Experience working with, or an interest in Agile Methodologies, such as Extreme Programming (XP) and Scrum 

Knowledge of software best practices, like Test-Driven Development (TDD) and Continuous Integration (CI) 

Strong communication and client-facing skills with the ability to work in a consulting environment is essential

Desire to contribute to the wider technical community through collaboration, coaching, and mentoring of other technologists

jobs.title: SDE
jobs.description:
Must have

  • Hands on experience in Django, Django Rest FrameWork
  • Experience in managing Amazon Web Services
  • Should have experience in deployment cycle
  • You should know when and why to use Redis
  • Knowledge about Nginx configuration
  • Hands on experience in Linux/CLI
  • Experience in MySQL
  • Hands on experience in Angular JS 1.5.x
  • Should have experience in JavaScripting and debugging
  • Knowledge of SCSS, Responsive design, CSS Frameworks like Semantic/Bootstrap
  • Hands on experience in Git CLI
  • Zest to learn and try new technology

Nice to have

  • Knowledge about WebRTC
  • Experience in Elastic Search

Perks

  • Work on product which is used by top companies in the world, Amazon, Microsoft, ThoughtWorks to name a few.
  • Get mentorship from industry leaders.

Role & Responsibilities

  • As a full stack developer you will be responsible to develop and maintain the features.
  • You have complete ownership of things you build.
  • We are always open to new ideas and implementing it.
  • You will take care of DevOps as well. You application should scale whenever required.

jobs.title: Software Development Engineer
jobs.description: The Applicant Tracking System (ATS) market size is expected to grow from USD 1.08 billion in 2017 to USD 1.81 billion by 2023, at a Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of 8.3% during the forecast period. The base year considered for this study is 2017 and the forecast period is 2018–2023. With the increasing penetration of Internet of Things (IoT) and related technologies, such as big data and server less architecture, the demand for ATS software and services among enterprises is expected to grow significantly.

jobs.title: Architect
jobs.description:
Requirements

The ideal candidate will have:

 

·         20+ years of experience in Software Product Development with all or significant part in product companies preferably in Supply Chain domain and/or Transporation / Logistics / Customs.

·         Experience operating in global development organizations

·         Experience managing software development teams in India

·         Experience working for enterprise software organizations from US & Europe

·         Collaborate within India teams, global PD team and business units for operational and strategic initiatives

·         A strong understanding of software development and operations

·         Hands-on experience as a software engineer in technology space similar to the one used at BluJay (Java/J2EE, C++, Enterprise Applications, Oracle, AWS) in the early parts of his/her career

·         Experience of managing products of different technologies and architectures

·         Experience in running Agile product engineering organization

·         Strong people management skills

·         Strong project & risk management skills with a proven track record of delivering releases on time with good quality

·         A good understanding of Supply Chain / Transportation / Logistics domain and business processes (Desirable)

·         Highly self-motivated and self-directed

·         Fair minded & assertive individual who demands professional behavior in all situations

·         Makes decisions keeping company’s interest as the first priority

 

Responsibilities

•        Be a hands-on leader providing mentorship and guidance to 200+ size development team consisting of Developers, Architects, QA, BA, documentation and release engineering

•        Recruit, motivate and retain top talent that is effective, productive and adheres to company values

•        Manage teams that are extended, collocated and distributed

•        Participate and contribute to company’s technology, product roadmap and other initiatives

jobs.title: UI Developer
jobs.description:
To be successful in this role, you will ideally bring the following :


Must have -


  • ReactJs with experience building complex applications using Redux with real time capabilities.
  • Strong Javascript/Typescript. If candidate doesn’t know typescript, need to be willing to learn.
  • Good understanding of HTML5 & CSS3.
  • Familiarity with webpack.
  • Familiarity of unit testing framework (jest, mocha, enzyme, etc).
  • Appreciation of writing high quality code.
  • Appreciation of writing unit testing.
  • Enjoy working with directly with end users for building the application.
  • Strong core Java 8 experience and knowledge.
  • Good knowledge of spring especially using spring to develop web applications.
  • Good understanding of distributed system concepts.

 

Optional -


  • Familiarity with RxJava, RxJS and Reactive programming concepts.
  • Familiarity with material ui, semantic ui.
  • Implementing distributed systems using Vertx.
  • Familiarity with open source technologies for building distributed applications.
  • Experience with C++.

How you match

Criteria provided by job posterLearn more about how you match this job poster’s requirements.

jobs.title: Customer Service Associate
jobs.description:
An Amazon Customer Service Associate is a critical part of our mission to deliver timely, accurate and professional customer service to all Amazon customers. This vital position requires an action-oriented, flexible problem-solver who will assist customers in expediting orders and correcting post-sales problems. Associates communicate with customers primarily through mail, chat and phone and utilize a variety of software tools to navigate customer accounts, research and review policies and communicate effective solutions in a fun and fast-paced environment.

Job Description                                                                                                                                                              

Customer Service Associate- VCS- India:

Virtual Customer Service (VCS) - It is a ‘Work from Home’ model for India CS. VCS associates are expected to work from a home location approved by Amazon for all scheduled hours. It is the responsibility of the associates to ensure uninterrupted internet connectivity and ‘work-like’ environment at home location so that associates can deliver their best in terms of productivity and quality. 

Knowledge & Skills Required

Desired skills:

·        Action oriented, self-disciplined and organized

·        Effective time management skills and ability to prioritize work time to ensure productivity and     department standards

·        Ability to communicate clearly with both internal and external customers

·        Good comprehension skills - ability to clearly understand and address customer issues appropriately

·        Good composition skills - ability to compose grammatically correct, concise, and accurate written responses

·        Ability to use a desktop/Laptop computer system, Familiarity with Windows 7, Microsoft Outlook, and Internet Explorer

·        Good typing skills


Preferred Criteria:

·          Should be self-driven, motivated and task driven individual who can learn fast and operate with minimal support from Manager and Lead.

·          Should ensure uninterrupted internet connectivity during working shift so as to ensure maximum productivity

·          Should ensure ‘Work-like’ environment with no disturbance during the work hours.


The ideal candidates will be comfortable in a fast-paced, multi-tasked, high-energy environment. They will be creative and analytical problem solvers with a passion for excellent customer service.

Customer Focus:

·      Excellent customer service skills, including maintaining focus on the customer issue in a fast-paced environment

·      Ability to empathize with and prioritize customer needs

·      Demonstrates interpersonal skills with a diverse customer base

·      Demonstrates conflict resolution, negotiation, and de-escalation skills

·      Demonstrates ownership to resolve challenging customer issues, escalating when necessary

·      Ability to determine customer needs and provide appropriate solutions

·      Maintain regular and reliable attendance, including the daily schedule as assigned

·      Flexible with the working schedule; may be expected to work weekends, holidays and events

·      Ability to work overtime as required by business - asmuch as 60 hours a week, most often occurring in the weeks surrounding the Christmas holiday season

Problem Solving Skills:

·      Effective problem solving skills including decision making, time management and immediate prioritization of tasks as assigned

·      Ability to approach problems logically and rationally

·      Action oriented and self-disciplined

·      Organized and detail-oriented

·      Ability to quickly and effectively prioritize work time in various departments to meet business need

·      Ability to maintain composure in highly escalated situations


Qualifications required

Minimum qualification is 10 + 2. Any graduate


Shifts: Rotational

Benefits: NSA, OT, Meal Card.

jobs.title: Relationship Manager
jobs.description:
Job Responsibility


Representation of Life Insurance to Business.

Candidate will be a Frontline Relationship Manger.

The leads will be provided by the Organization.

Need to close leads and generate business through leads.

Visit potential customers for new business.

Handling existing customers portfolio and generating through.

Assuring that the business targets are met month on month.

Working on pre-fixed appointments.


What is in it for you?


Grooming and Development as a sales person.

Developing competencies by dealing with High Profile Customers.

Creating Value proposition for customers by selling them Life Insurance.

High Earning potential through Incentives as well as BDAs (Business Development Allowance)

Defined Career Growth path.

Fast track promotion on completion of Gold Sheet.

Regular Skill enhancement programs


Reguired Qualification

1yr to 6yr (Any Experiance)

The person Should be Ready for Field Sales

Should be Graduate Completed


Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter


Industry: Banking / Financial Services / Broking


Functional Area: Sales , Retail , Business Development


Role Category:Retail Sales


Role:Sales/Business Development Manager


Employment Type: Permanent Job, Full Time


Keyskills


Sales Presentations Business Development New Business Business Generation Selling Dealing Life Insurance Service Quality Fast Track


Desired Candidate Profile


Ecentric candidate from chennai or ready to relocate to Chennai

Education-


UG: Any Graduate - Any Specialization
